meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Digg, pictures, technology, breaking news, entertainment, politics, headline news, celebrity news, offbeat, world business, sports, funny videos

meta.title: Digg - What the Internet is talking about right now

div.div: THE SWASTIKA TATTOO GIVES YOU AWAY

div.a: A Man's Face Can Tell You If He's Likely To Act Racist

div.div: Not every face predicts racist behavior as strongly as this one. But some men's faces do in much subtler ways.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Xl1iVt&via=Digg&text=A Man's Face Can Tell You If He's Likely To Act Racist

div.a: FBI Declares War On The Scooter Store

div.div: Approximately 150 federal and state law enforcement agents launched a massive raid on one of the biggest perpetrators of government fraud in America: The Scooter Store.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Yd4jHN&via=Digg&text=FBI Declares War On The Scooter Store

div.a: A Dozen Watches That Cost More Than Your House

div.div: Shelter? A warm hearth and roof over your head? Who needs any of that when you can blow a half million bucks on swanky, hyper-complicated timepieces like these?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WZUtcv&via=Digg&text=A Dozen Watches That Cost More Than Your House

div.a: What Day Most Changed The Course Of History?

div.div: Professors, filmmakers and scientists weight in.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YbmMAd&via=Digg&text=What Day Most Changed The Course Of History?

div.a: North Korean Women Are 'Encouraged' To Choose From 18 Officially Sanctioned Hairstyles

div.div: You won't see a North Korean woman sporting the Jennifer Aniston style blow-dry. That is because women are being encouraged to do their bit for the world's most conformist state - by getting a specially approved haircut.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/156KpA9&via=Digg&text=North Korean Women Are 'Encouraged' To Choose From 18 Officially Sanctioned Hairstyles

div.a: Americans Love Breast Implants Now More Than Ever

div.div: According to new data released by the International Society of Aesthetic Plastic Surgeons, it seems that despite worldwide economic problems, expensive plastic surgery is more popular than ever.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XCqkyq&via=Digg&text=Americans Love Breast Implants Now More Than Ever

div.a: Fast Food Makes Up 11% of Our Total Calories As A Nation

div.div: Here's some potentially good news: The number of calories we're getting from fast food has actually dropped significantly within the past decade.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WZymmz&via=Digg&text=Fast Food Makes Up 11% of Our Total Calories As A Nation

div.div: THE SUITS ARE A DIFFERENT STORY

div.a: Ten Bond Cars You Can Afford

div.div: Take heart, agents in training. A handful of Bond cars can be had for those with less of a spending budget than MI6

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/11XU26D&via=Digg&text=Ten Bond Cars You Can Afford

div.a: Russia No Longer Classifies Beer As Food

div.div: Hours after his inauguration last May, President Vladimir Putin signed a decree ordering his government to increase Russian life expectancy to 74 years by 2018, reflecting urgency in the effort to keep the world’s largest country filled with enough people to sustain it.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WcLW24&via=Digg&text=Russia No Longer Classifies Beer As Food

div.div: YOU CAN'T JUST LEAVE THESE LAYING AROUND

div.a: The Al Qaeda Guide To Avoiding Drones

div.div: The Associated Press just literally stumbled across the terrorist's guide to avoiding pesky American drones in northern Mali.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Vz0Anc&via=Digg&text=The Al Qaeda Guide To Avoiding Drones

div.a: Learn Every Oscar Acceptance Speech Stat Imaginable

div.div: Did you ever want to know the percentage of female Oscar winners who thank their moms (31 percent) or male winners who thank their dads (23 percent)? This website is for you.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VQpdhA&via=Digg&text=Learn Every Oscar Acceptance Speech Stat Imaginable

div.div: THE OTHER KIND OF CRAPS IN THE CRIB

div.a: Are Apps Making Your Child A Gambling Addict?

div.div: An obstreperous child can quickly become compliant when allowed to play a game on a mobile device. But now, some experts are warning that some games might be "addictive" and may be "grooming" kids to be future gamblers.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VLhEc1&via=Digg&text=Are Apps Making Your Child A Gambling Addict?

div.a: Montana Bill Would Let Sheriffs Arrest FBI Agents For Arresting People

div.div: If Montana voters approve Gary Marbut's referendum in November 2014, any FBI agent who tries to arrest a Montanan for a federal crime could be arrested—and charged with kidnapping.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VNGZlB&via=Digg&text=Montana Bill Would Let Sheriffs Arrest FBI Agents For Arresting People

div.div: PUT ON YOUR TINFOIL HATS AND READ

div.a: All The President's Neuroscientists

div.div: President Obama's proposed Brain Activity Map Project could lead to cures for Alzheimer's, autism, and schizophrenia. But members of Congress should read the fine print when the $3 billion proposal hits their desks next month — because the project might also provide the first viable means of remotely controlling the human mind.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Vz7eJZ&via=Digg&text=All The President's Neuroscientists

div.a: How Oscar Pistorius Says He Killed Reeve Steenkamp

div.div: In an affidavit, Oscar Pistorius, the double-amputee track star, has told how he accidentally killed his girlfriend Reeva Steenkamp.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XNuL6J&via=Digg&text=How Oscar Pistorius Says He Killed Reeve Steenkamp

div.a: Inside A Big Money Miami Heist

div.div: Stealing $7.4 million is the easy part. Keeping it is harder.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/12QQAtR&via=Digg&text=Inside A Big Money Miami Heist

div.a: China's Killer Drones Didn't Kill A Drug Lord, But Obama's Drones Could Have

div.div: Today's news that Chinese authorities now have advanced navigation and weaponry to kill suspected criminals in a manhunt was as notable for what China can do — target a Myanmar drug kingpin suspected in the killing of 13 Chinese soldiers, unmanned, and from above — as for what it didn't: actually assassinate him with a drone.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YAxoe8&via=Digg&text=China's Killer Drones Didn't Kill A Drug Lord, But Obama's Drones Could Have

div.a: How To Feel When Your Ex Is Nominated For An Oscar

div.div: Despite the tabloids’ warnings against dating people gunning for international acclaim, I found myself watching as Emma Stone announced my ex-boyfriend’s name on national television last month.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/13mhtBv&via=Digg&text=How To Feel When Your Ex Is Nominated For An Oscar

div.div: BRAVE LITTLE TOASTER COULDN'T SAVE HER

div.a: Woman Shot By Oven While Trying To Cook Waffles

div.div: An 18-year-old Florida woman was only slightly injured this week when she was shot by her friend's oven, police said.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YJvTJu&via=Digg&text=Woman Shot By Oven While Trying To Cook Waffles

div.a: Cramped Apartments In Hong Kong Shot Directly From Above

div.div: In the middle of last year, The Economist released rankings for the world’s most livable cities, and Hong Kong was found at the top. What many people don’t know, however, is that there is a percentage of Hong Kong residents living in rather horrid conditions.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WNwRGm&via=Digg&text=Cramped Apartments In Hong Kong Shot Directly From Above

div.a: Over 20% Of Norway Watched A 12-Hour Special About Firewood

div.div: One thing that does not divide Norway, apparently, is its love of discussing Norwegian wood.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Y55M2y&via=Digg&text=Over 20% Of Norway Watched A 12-Hour Special About Firewood

div.a: This Race Was the Biggest Sh*t Show Of All-Time

div.div: Crashes almost every lap. A car flipped over and on fire. Cussing on live TV. The best accents in the world. All this and more from a modified stock car race on a Tuesday night.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UMlsYI&via=Digg&text=This Race Was the Biggest Sh*t Show Of All-Time

div.a: The Greatest Survival Story You've Never Heard

div.div: They were 31 men at the bottom of the world exploring uncharted territory. What followed was one of the most terrifying survival stories of all time.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VyQuCw&via=Digg&text=The Greatest Survival Story You've Never Heard

div.a: Eleanor Roosevelt And The Soviet Sniper

div.div: Lyudmila Pavlichenko visited with President Roosevelt, becoming the first Soviet citizen to be welcomed at the White House. Afterward, Eleanor Roosevelt asked the Ukranian-born officer to accompany her on a tour of the country and tell Americans of her experiences as a woman in combat.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Xrrv1z&via=Digg&text=Eleanor Roosevelt And The Soviet Sniper

div.a: 'Star Wars' Fans Feel The Force At Lightsaber Class

div.div: A group of San Francisco Star Wars fans who want to travel to a galaxy not that far away have created a combat choreography class for Jedis-in-training with their weapon of choice: the lightsaber.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/15ym8UV&via=Digg&text='Star Wars' Fans Feel The Force At Lightsaber Class

div.a: What Are Our Butts Trying To Say?

div.div: “It was a butt tweet” is the cool new explainer for things you tweeted but probably shouldn't have. But what if it really WAS a butt tweet? What if our butts have something to tell us?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/11Y3qqV&via=Digg&text=What Are Our Butts Trying To Say?

div.a: Teen Falls 45 Feet From Ski Lift After Throwing Snowball At The Chair Ahead Of Him

div.div: If you don't lower your safety bar, you're gonna have a bad time.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YEq0hT&via=Digg&text=Teen Falls 45 Feet From Ski Lift After Throwing Snowball At The Chair Ahead Of Him

div.a: A Behind-The-Back Ping Pong Shot You Won't Believe

div.div: Is this video trickery? Nope; just a guy being way too good at table tennis.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YaE5FI&via=Digg&text=A Behind-The-Back Ping Pong Shot You Won't Believe

div.a: When Brain Damage Unlocks The Genius Within

div.div: One acquired savant, a high-school dropout brutally beaten by muggers, is the only known person in the world able to draw complex geometric patterns called fractals; he also claims to have discovered a mistake in pi.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WUFhvD&via=Digg&text=When Brain Damage Unlocks The Genius Within

div.a: How To Stop The Bullies

div.div: The inside story of how experts at Facebook, computer scientists at MIT, and even members of the hacker collective Anonymous are hunting for solutions to an increasingly tricky problem.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WrvNaQ&via=Digg&text=How To Stop The Bullies

div.div: SO GUYS CAN DEFINITELY TAKE THE HINT

div.a: This Dress Knows You're Horny

div.div: A social design lab has created a line of high-tech dresses that become transparent based on personal interactions between partners -- or whenever the wearer gets aroused.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XOOyma&via=Digg&text=This Dress Knows You're Horny

div.a: Do These Foreign Actors Sound Like The Stars They Dub?

div.div: While the concept of dubbing movies is alien to many British and American cinemagoers, it still remains de rigueur in many parts of Europe. The regular voice artists who dub for the likes of Bruce Willis or Tom Cruise can become stars themselves.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YD7SVD&via=Digg&text=Do These Foreign Actors Sound Like The Stars They Dub?

div.div: THE LOW RATE ISN'T WORTH IT

div.a: The Long Dark History Of One L.A. Hotel

div.div: The gruesome discovery this week of a young woman's body inside a rooftop water tank at the Cecil Hotel in Los Angeles is not the Cecil's first brush with such notoriety.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VODGL1&via=Digg&text=The Long Dark History Of One L.A. Hotel

div.a: The Anatomy Of A Stoning

div.div: Stoning is still used as a method of execution in several countries around the world. Here's how a stoning occurs in accordance with the exact language of the Iranian Penal Code.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/arB35g&via=Digg&text=The Anatomy Of A Stoning
